verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שָׁלֹ֔שׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Losh, Now it came to pass in the third לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> le-ho-She-a' of Hoshea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah of Elah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel מָלַ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach began to reign חִזְקִיָּ֥ה <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Yah [that] Hezekiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son אָחָ֖ז <S%H271><s%> 'a-Chaz of Ahaz מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah. of Judah

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old עֶשְׂרִ֨ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim Twenty וְחָמֵ֤שׁ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho, was he when he began to reign וְעֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> ve-'es-Rim twenty וָתֵ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H8672><s%> va-Te-sha' and nine שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, His mother's אֲבִ֖י <S%H21><s%> 'a-Vi also [was] Abi בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter זְכַרְיָֽה׃ <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah. of Zachariah

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah did דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid according to all that David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv. his father

ה֣וּא׀ <S%H1931><s%> hu He הֵסִ֣יר <S%H5493><s%> he-Sir He removed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּמ֗וֹת <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mot, the high places וְשִׁבַּר֙ <S%H7665><s%> ve-shib-Bar and brake אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּצֵּבֹ֔ת <S%H4676><s%> ham-matz-tze-Vot, the images וְכָרַ֖ת <S%H3772><s%> ve-cha-Rat and cut down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָֽאֲשֵׁרָ֑ה <S%H842><s%> ha-'a-she-Rah; the groves וְכִתַּת֩ <S%H3807><s%> ve-chit-Tat and brake in pieces נְחַ֨שׁ <S%H5175><s%> ne-Chash serpent הַנְּחֹ֜שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> han-ne-Cho-shet the brasen אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had made מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, that Moses כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הַיָּמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim for unto those days הָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem-mah those הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מְקַטְּרִ֣ים <S%H6999><s%> me-kat-te-Rim did burn incense ל֔וֹ lo, וַיִּקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra- to it and he called ל֖וֹ lo נְחֻשְׁתָּֽן׃ <S%H5180><s%> ne-chush-Tan. it Nehushtan

בַּיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei- God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בָּטָ֑ח <S%H982><s%> ba-Tach; He trusted וְאַחֲרָ֞יו <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rav so that after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- none הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become כָמֹ֗הוּ <S%H3644><s%> cha-Mo-hu, like בְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei him was none like him among all the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher who הָי֖וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nav. nor [any] that were before

וַיִּדְבַּק֙ <S%H1692><s%> vai-yid-Bak For he clave בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, to the LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> sar [and] departed מֵאַֽחֲרָ֑יו <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rav; not from following וַיִּשְׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> vai-yish-Mor him but kept מִצְוֹתָ֔יו <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav, his commandments אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. Moses

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah become יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo, with בְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> be-Chol all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- he יֵצֵ֖א <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze whithersoever he went forth יַשְׂכִּ֑יל <S%H7919><s%> yas-Kil; was with him [and] he prospered וַיִּמְרֹ֥ד <S%H4775><s%> vai-yim-Rod and he rebelled בְּמֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> be-Me-lech- against the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not עֲבָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H5647><s%> a-va-Do. and served

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- He הִכָּ֧ה <S%H5221><s%> hik-Kah He smote אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּלִשְׁתִּ֛ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim the Philistines עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far עַזָּ֖ה <S%H5804><s%> 'az-Zah [even] unto Gaza וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et גְּבוּלֶ֑יהָ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lei-ha; and the borders מִמִּגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> mi-mig-Dal thereof from the tower נוֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H5341><s%> notz-Rim of the watchmen עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir city מִבְצָֽר׃ <S%H4013><s%> miv-Tzar. to the fenced פ Peh

וַֽיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become בַּשָּׁנָ֤ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הָֽרְבִיעִית֙ <S%H7243><s%> ha-re-vi-'It And it came to pass in the fourth לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech of king חִזְקִיָּ֔הוּ <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Ya-hu, Hezekiah הִ֚יא <S%H1931><s%> hi which הַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> hash-sha-Nah year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ית <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'It, which [was] the seventh לְהוֹשֵׁ֥עַ <S%H1954><s%> le-ho-She-a' of Hoshea בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אֵלָ֖ה <S%H425><s%> 'e-Lah of Elah מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel עָלָ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah came up שַׁלְמַנְאֶ֧סֶר <S%H8022><s%> shal-man-'E-ser [that] Shalmaneser מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אַשּׁ֛וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron against Samaria וַיָּ֥צַר <S%H6696><s%> vai-Ya-tzar and besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha. against

וַֽיִּלְכְּדֻ֗הָ <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-ke-Du-ha, they took מִקְצֵה֙ <S%H7097><s%> mik-Tzeh And at the end שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> sha-Losh of three שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years בִּשְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> bish-nat- year שֵׁ֖שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh it [even] in the sixth לְחִזְקִיָּ֑ה <S%H2396><s%> le-chiz-ki-Yah; of Hezekiah הִ֣יא <S%H1931><s%> hi which שְׁנַת־ <S%H8141><s%> she-nat- year תֵּ֗שַׁע <S%H8672><s%> Te-sha', that [is] the ninth לְהוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H1954><s%> le-ho-She-a' of Hoshea מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel נִלְכְּדָ֖ה <S%H3920><s%> nil-ke-Dah was taken שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> sho-me-Ron. Samaria

וַיֶּ֧גֶל <S%H1540><s%> vai-Ye-gel did carry away מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And the king אַשּׁ֛וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shu-rah; unto Assyria וַיַּנְחֵ֞ם <S%H5148><s%> vai-yan-Chem and put בַּחְלַ֧ח <S%H2477><s%> bach-Lach them in Halah וּבְחָב֛וֹר <S%H2249><s%> u-ve-cha-Vor and in Habor נְהַ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> ne-Har [by] the river גּוֹזָ֖ן <S%H1470><s%> go-Zan of Gozan וְעָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rei and in the cities מָדָֽי׃ <S%H4074><s%> ma-Dai. of the Medes

עַ֣ל׀ <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher they לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- neither שָׁמְע֗וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U, Because they obeyed בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> be-kOl not the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem, their God וַיַּעַבְרוּ֙ <S%H5674><s%> vai-ya-'av-Ru but transgressed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּרִית֔וֹ <S%H1285><s%> be-ri-To, his covenant אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after צִוָּ֔ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah, commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh [and] all that Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved the servant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U and would not hear וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo neither עָשֽׂוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su. [them] nor do פ Peh

וּבְאַרְבַּע֩ <S%H702><s%> u-ve-'ar-Ba' four עֶשְׂרֵ֨ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah year לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech of king חִזְקִיָּ֗ה <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Yah, Hezekiah עָלָ֞ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lah come up סַנְחֵרִ֤יב <S%H5576><s%> san-che-Riv did Sennacherib מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king אַשּׁוּר֙ <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria עַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עָרֵ֧י <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rei cities יְהוּדָ֛ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah הַבְּצֻר֖וֹת <S%H1219><s%> hab-be-tzu-Rot against all the fenced וַֽיִּתְפְּשֵֽׂם׃ <S%H8610><s%> Vai-yit-pe-Sem. and took

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent חִזְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Yah And Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- to the king אַשּׁוּר֩׀ <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria לָכִ֨ישָׁה׀ <S%H3923><s%> la-Chi-shah to Lachish לֵאמֹ֤ר׀ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying חָטָ֙אתִי֙ <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-ti I have offended שׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> shuv return מֵֽעָלַ֔י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai, and אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whatever תִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten from me that which thou puttest עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai on אֶשָּׂ֑א <S%H5375><s%> 'es-Sa; on me will I bear וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem appointed מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- And the king אַשּׁ֜וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur of Assyria עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- of חִזְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2396><s%> chiz-ki-Yah unto Hezekiah מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah שְׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> she-Losh three מֵאוֹת֙ <S%H3967><s%> me-'Ot hundred כִּכַּר־ <S%H3603><s%> kik-kar- talents כֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef, of silver וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim and thirty כִּכַּ֥ר <S%H3603><s%> kik-Kar talents זָהָֽב׃ <S%H2091><s%> za-Hav. of gold
